CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 19, 1954, pg. 8 reads: "Thousands Attend Courier Home, Food Show...8. A large crowd almost blots out the Pepsi-Cola booth as Julian C. Nicholas of Washington, D.C., feverishly works to quench the thirst of Home Fair visitors...-Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Crowd visiting food booths, including Pepsi-Cola booth with Julian C. Nicholas wearing bow tie, in Hunt Armory for the 1954 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Hunt Armory (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Signs--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Advertising--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
